fast-flip.flip-token-hint: Flips the selected token (hold SHIFT to flip vertically)
fast-flip.flip-tile-hint: Flips the selected tile (hold SHIFT to flip vertically)
fast-flip.toggle-afk-hint: Toggles the AFK status of the selected tokens
fast-flip.show-flip-buttons-hint: Show or hide the flip buttons on the token HUD
fast-flip.show-toggle-afk-hint: Show or hide the AFK toggle button on the token HUD
fast-flip.allow-afk-toggle-hint: Allow the AFK status to be toggled for player owned tokens
fast-flip.afk-overlay-icon-path-hint: Path to the image to use for the AFK status indicator on tokens
fast-flip.show-afk-status-in-chat-hint: Send a chat message whenever a player's AFK status changes
fast-flip.show-speech-bubble-hint: Displays a speech bubble attached to your selected token to all players.
fast-flip.allow-speech-bubbles-hint: Allow speech bubbles to be displayed on tokens when the hotkey is activated.
fast-flip.speech-bubble-font-size-hint: Font size of the names shown in speech bubbles in px units.
fast-flip.animation-duration-hint: Duration of the token flip animation in seconds (0 disables animations). Use at your own risk. Only verified to work with Pathfinder 2e.
